import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Navbar from '../Common/Navbar' import { changeStatus, viewTicket, getComment, addComment } from '../../Redux/action' import { uuidv4 } from 'uuid' import { format } from 'fecha' class ChangeStat extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { status: '', comment: "", comment_by: this.props.loginSuccess.role, comment_time: format(new Date(), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'), ticket_id: this.props.match.params.id } } componentDidMount = () => { const { getComment, match } = this.props getComment(match.params.id) } handleClick = () => { // const { changeStatus, loginSuccess } = this.props // changeStatus(this.state) // console.log(loginSuccess) // viewTicket(loginSuccess.id) } render() { const { view_ticket, match, getComments, loginSuccess } = this.props const data = view_ticket.find(item => item.id === Number(match.params.id)) console.log(data, view_ticket, getComments, loginSuccess) return ( <>
Ticket Information
{data.title}

User Name : {data.company}

Status : {data.status}
Category : {data.category}
{ console.log(getComments) // getComments && getComments.map(item => ( //
//
// { // this.props.loginSuccess.role === "company" ? // {item.comment_by === "company" ? "you" : "user"} // : "" // } // { // this.props.loginSuccess.role === "user" ? // {item.comment_by === "user" ? this.props.loginSuccess.name : "company"} // : "" // } // {item.comment_time} //
//
{item.comment}
//
// )) }
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ view_ticket: state.view_ticket, loginSuccess: state.loginSuccess, getComments: state.getComments }); const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ changeStatus: payload => dispatch(changeStatus(payload)), viewTicket: payload => dispatch(viewTicket(payload)), getComment: payload => dispatch(getComment(payload)), addComment: payload => dispatch(addComment(payload)) }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(ChangeStat);
